price: Na mmom woi akyi obiara a ͻbεdane n’akyi no, saa nkorͻfoͻ no ne abͻneεfoͻ no”.
arabic: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: faman tawallā baʿda dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
